tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(id),
    level INT,
    experience INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    username VARCHAR,
    stats JSON,
    achievements TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    username VARCHAR,
    level INTEGER,
    points INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    achievement_id INTEGER,
    achievement_name VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
    wins INT,
    losses INT,
    games_played INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    games_played INT,
    total_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_achieved DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE friend_list (
    player_id INT,
    friend_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, friend_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (friend_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    date_sent TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id)
);
